post.body: Now I know what to buy for a few of my friends for Christmas! How hilarious!
Wait...what happened to the Micky Schmee sammy?
That is funny. Goodness I feel like such a nerd.
x=3y
Welcome!
looks good!
I feel the same way.
Please tell me it's got a Charlie Brown Christmas on it.
Wow! What the heck did you buy?
No worries. Ben Franklin here I come!
Wait a minute...does that mean you and Sara are in town?
Why yes...I do think I will eat this Butterfinger miniature as a cure for my headache. Thank you!
Hurry Kings...come out with another record! http://tinyurl.com/yr3zsn
It's raining out so I am spending this evening on my Telecaster. Channeling my inner rock child.
Completely disappointed with this CD sampler I am listening to. Blah!
Looking at Cooper sleeping on the top of the couch. Sometimes I wish I was my dog. What a life.
Trying to keep my wits together. Currently registering music with ECO but don't understand what is what on here.
Currently taking a break from productivity. I feel so guilty.
Missing my red hollow body guitar. Why did I sell it? Anyone got an extra one lying around?
Currently eating the largest acai bowl ever with extra granola. End result? My insides are freezing.
It is Prince's half brother! I'm diggin it. http://tinyurl.com/6q8saw
Drying off...being soggy at the moment is an understatement.
All hail Willy Wonka for creating the Everlasting Gobstopper!
Listening to The Cure and feeling like a child of the 80's.
Trying out a new guitar I got for Christmas. Thank you Santa!
Eating a post-holiday frittata with spicy sausage, potatoes, onions, cheese and parsley. And gonna eat an orange from the yard.
Stuffed full of Christmas dinner and ready for crazy dog time with Coop and Jack. A howlin good time had by all.
Getting ready for a pumpkin bread and chocolate chip cookie bake-off at home. Merry Christmas Eve everyone!
I am surveying all of the delicious things I have to eat. Cookies, chex-mix, orange preserves, lilikoi butter, brownies, candy.
Laughing...this never gets old. No matter how often I watch them. http://tinyurl.com/2ycvg7
Experiencing helmet hair this morning and looking for nearest rubber band to tame this beast.
Can a recording engineer please develop a Neko Case vocal plug-in for me?
Trying to get it together after the overload of holiday parties this weekend.
Trying to be technological and understand why my SD card is acting weird. I think I might need tech support.
Just lost the centerpiece! Dammit! Went to the oldest person at the table. Can't complain since I'm the youngest. Wahoo!
Red wine is keeping me company at a wedding I don't know anyone. Thank you cabernet.
2 cats, 2 dogs, 3 roomates... this place is getting crowded.
Veto-ing leaf blowers in the morning. Too early. Use a rake.
Social anxiety in a social setting. A bad blend.
Thinking about when I'll have time to buy yarn to make my knit cap. Remix...get ready.
